queries.me: Returns the current authenticated user's information and visible navigation items
queries.dashboard: Retrieves dashboard statistics including active facilities, pending facilities, total disbursed amount, and total collateral
queries.user: Fetches a specific user by their unique identifier
queries.users: Returns a list of all users in the system
queries.role: Fetches a specific role by its unique identifier
queries.roles: Returns a paginated list of all roles in the system
queries.permissionSets: Returns a paginated list of all available permission sets
queries.customer: Fetches a specific customer by their unique identifier
queries.customerByEmail: Fetches a customer by their email address
queries.customerByPublicId: Fetches a customer by their public-facing identifier
queries.customers: Returns a paginated, sortable, and filterable list of customers
queries.withdrawal: Fetches a specific withdrawal by its unique identifier
queries.withdrawalByPublicId: Fetches a withdrawal by its public-facing identifier
queries.withdrawals: Returns a paginated list of all withdrawals
queries.deposit: Fetches a specific deposit by its unique identifier
queries.depositByPublicId: Fetches a deposit by its public-facing identifier
queries.depositAccount: Fetches a specific deposit account by its unique identifier
queries.depositAccountByPublicId: Fetches a deposit account by its public-facing identifier
queries.depositAccounts: Returns a paginated list of all deposit accounts
queries.deposits: Returns a paginated list of all deposits
queries.termsTemplate: Fetches a specific credit facility terms template by its unique identifier
queries.termsTemplates: Returns a list of all credit facility terms templates
queries.creditFacility: Fetches a specific credit facility by its unique identifier
queries.creditFacilityProposal: Fetches a specific credit facility proposal by its unique identifier
queries.creditFacilityProposals: Returns a paginated list of all credit facility proposals
queries.pendingCreditFacility: Fetches a specific pending credit facility by its unique identifier
queries.pendingCreditFacilities: Returns a paginated list of all pending credit facilities awaiting collateralization
queries.creditFacilityByPublicId: Fetches a credit facility by its public-facing identifier
queries.creditFacilities: Returns a paginated, sortable, and filterable list of credit facilities
queries.disbursal: Fetches a specific disbursal by its unique identifier
queries.disbursalByPublicId: Fetches a disbursal by its public-facing identifier
queries.disbursals: Returns a paginated list of all disbursals
queries.liquidation: Fetches a specific liquidation by its unique identifier
queries.liquidations: Returns a paginated list of all liquidations
queries.custodians: Returns a paginated list of all configured custodians
queries.committee: Fetches a specific committee by its unique identifier
queries.committees: Returns a paginated list of all committees
queries.policy: Fetches a specific approval policy by its unique identifier
queries.policies: Returns a paginated list of all approval policies
queries.approvalProcess: Fetches a specific approval process by its unique identifier
queries.approvalProcesses: Returns a paginated list of all approval processes
queries.customerDocument: Fetches a specific customer document by its unique identifier
queries.ledgerAccount: Fetches a specific ledger account by its unique identifier
queries.ledgerAccountByCode: Fetches a ledger account by its account code
queries.transactionTemplates: Returns a paginated list of all ledger transaction templates
queries.ledgerTransaction: Fetches a specific ledger transaction by its unique identifier
queries.ledgerTransactionsForTemplateCode: Returns a paginated list of ledger transactions for a specific template code
queries.journalEntries: Returns a paginated list of all journal entries
queries.trialBalance: Generates a trial balance report for the specified date range
queries.chartOfAccounts: Returns the chart of accounts structure
queries.fiscalYear: Fetches a specific fiscal year by its unique identifier
queries.fiscalYearByYear: Fetches a fiscal year by its year string (e.g., '2024')
queries.fiscalYears: Returns a paginated list of all fiscal years
queries.balanceSheet: Generates a balance sheet report for the specified date range
queries.profitAndLossStatement: Generates a profit and loss statement for the specified date range
queries.realtimePrice: Returns the current BTC/USD exchange rate
queries.audit: Returns a paginated list of audit log entries
queries.depositConfig: Returns the current deposit module configuration
queries.domainConfigs: Returns a paginated list of all domain configuration settings
queries.creditConfig: Returns the current credit module configuration
queries.balanceSheetConfig: Returns the current balance sheet module configuration
queries.profitAndLossStatementConfig: Returns the current profit and loss statement module configuration
queries.publicIdTarget: Resolves a public ID to its target entity (customer, deposit, withdrawal, etc.)
queries.loanAgreement: Fetches a specific loan agreement by its unique identifier
queries.accountEntryCsv: Fetches the CSV export document for a specific ledger account
queries.reportRuns: Returns a paginated list of all report runs
queries.reportRun: Fetches a specific report run by its unique identifier

mutations.customerDocumentAttach: Uploads and attaches a document to a customer's profile
mutations.sumsubPermalinkCreate: Generates a Sumsub KYC verification permalink for a customer
mutations.userCreate: Creates a new user with a specified role
mutations.userUpdateRole: Updates the role assigned to an existing user
mutations.roleCreate: Creates a new role with specified permission sets
mutations.roleAddPermissionSets: Adds permission sets to an existing role
mutations.roleRemovePermissionSets: Removes permission sets from an existing role
mutations.customerCreate: Creates a new customer with email, telegram ID, and customer type
mutations.depositModuleConfigure: Configures the deposit module's chart of accounts mappings
mutations.manualTransactionExecute: Executes a manual ledger transaction with specified entries
mutations.depositRecord: Records a new deposit to a deposit account
mutations.withdrawalInitiate: Initiates a withdrawal request from a deposit account
mutations.withdrawalConfirm: Confirms an approved withdrawal, completing the transfer
mutations.depositAccountCreate: Creates a new deposit account for a customer
mutations.depositAccountFreeze: Freezes a deposit account, preventing transactions
mutations.depositAccountUnfreeze: Unfreezes a previously frozen deposit account
mutations.termsTemplateCreate: Creates a new credit facility terms template
mutations.termsTemplateUpdate: Updates an existing credit facility terms template
mutations.creditModuleConfigure: Configures the credit module's chart of accounts mappings
mutations.creditFacilityProposalCreate: Creates a new credit facility proposal for a customer
mutations.creditFacilityProposalCustomerApprovalCo: Concludes the customer approval step of a credit facility proposal
mutations.creditFacilityCollateralUpdate: Updates the collateral amount for an active credit facility
mutations.pendingCreditFacilityCollateralUpdate: Updates the collateral amount for a pending credit facility
mutations.creditFacilityPartialPaymentRecord: Records a partial payment towards a credit facility
mutations.creditFacilityPartialPaymentWithDateReco: Records a partial payment towards a credit facility with a specific effective date
mutations.creditFacilityDisbursalInitiate: Initiates a disbursal from a credit facility
mutations.creditFacilityComplete: Marks a credit facility as complete after full repayment
mutations.collateralLiquidationRecordCollateralSen: Records collateral sent out during a liquidation
mutations.liquidationRecordCollateralSent: Records collateral sent out during a liquidation
mutations.liquidationRecordProceedsReceived: Records proceeds received from a liquidation
mutations.custodianCreate: Creates a new custodian integration (Komainu or BitGo)
mutations.custodianConfigUpdate: Updates the configuration for an existing custodian
mutations.committeeAddUser: Adds a user to an approval committee
mutations.committeeRemoveUser: Removes a user from an approval committee
mutations.policyAssignCommittee: Assigns a committee to an approval policy with a threshold
mutations.approvalProcessApprove: Casts an approval vote in an approval process
mutations.approvalProcessDeny: Casts a denial vote in an approval process with a reason
mutations.customerDocumentDownloadLinkGenerate: Generates a temporary download link for a customer document
mutations.fiscalYearCloseMonth: Closes the current month in a fiscal year
mutations.chartOfAccountsAddRootNode: Adds a root node to the chart of accounts
mutations.chartOfAccountsAddChildNode: Adds a child node under a parent in the chart of accounts
mutations.balanceSheetConfigure: Configures the balance sheet module's account code mappings
mutations.profitAndLossStatementConfigure: Configures the profit and loss statement module's account code mappings
mutations.fiscalYearConfigure: Configures the fiscal year module's account code mappings
mutations.ledgerAccountCsvCreate: Creates a CSV export for a ledger account
mutations.accountingCsvDownloadLinkGenerate: Generates a download link for an accounting CSV document
mutations.loanAgreementGenerate: Generates a loan agreement document for a customer
mutations.loanAgreementDownloadLinkGenerate: Generates a download link for a loan agreement document
mutations.reportFileGenerateDownloadLink: Generates a download link for a report file
mutations.chartOfAccountsCsvImportWithBaseConfig: Imports a chart of accounts from a CSV file with base configuration settings
mutations.chartOfAccountsCsvImport: Imports a chart of accounts from a CSV file

queries.me: Returns the current authenticated customer's information including deposit account and credit facilities
queries.creditFacility: Fetches a specific credit facility by its unique identifier for the authenticated customer
queries.realtimePrice: Returns the current BTC/USD exchange rate
